name: Android Development
postCreateCommand: export ANDROID_HOME=/usr/local/android-sdk && mkdir -p $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/latest && wget https://dl.google.com/android/repository/commandlinetools-linux-8512546_latest.zip -O /tmp/cmdline-tools.zip && unzip /tmp/cmdline-tools.zip -d $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/latest && yes | $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/latest/bin/sdkmanager --licenses && $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/latest/bin/sdkmanager 'platform-tools' 'platforms;android-34' 'system-images;android-34;google_apis;x86_64' 'emulator' --channel=0 && echo 'export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/latest/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/emulator' >> ~/.bashrc
